tooltip.gwrexpansions.lightning_dragon_g: Converts Fired Silver Bullets into Lightning Dragonsteel Bullets
tooltip.gwrexpansions.ice_dragon_gun.des: Converts Fired Silver Bullets into Ice Dragonsteel Bullets
tooltip.gwrexpansions.fire_dragon_gun.de: Converts Fired Silver Bullets into Fire Dragonsteel Bullets
tooltip.gwrexpansions.golden_bullet.desc: There is a chance that it will be broken into gold nuggets
tooltip.gwrexpansions.netherite_bullet.d: %f %% chance to drop as item after impact (except when fired from shotguns)
tooltip.gwrexpansions.diamond_bullet.des: Splits into multiple fragments on impact(fragments can pierce 2 entity)
tooltip.gwrexpansions.cursium_sniper.des: Converts Fired Golden Bullets into Cursium Bullets
Cursium Bullets Headshots will summon  phantasmal halberds to attack mobs near the target
tooltip.gwrexpansions.lavapower_bullet.d: Creates cross-shaped or X-shaped area of flame jet
tooltip.gwrexpansions.lavapower_gun.desc: Converts Fired Golden Bullets into Lava Power Bullets
creating an expanded area of flame coverage
tooltip.gwrexpansions.ignitium_gatling.d: Converts Fired Golden Bullets into Ignitium Bullets
Ignitium Bullets will heal the shooter
